15.code:
<html>
<head>
    <title>Jump to Hello World</title>
    <style>
        body {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            min-height: 100vh;
        }
        #jump-button {
            padding: 15px 30px;
            font-size: 20px;
            background-color: #4CAF50;
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 5px;
            cursor: pointer;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <button id="jump-button" class="btn">Jump to Hello World</button>
    <script>
        const jumpButton = document.getElementById("jump-button");
        jumpButton.addEventListener("click", () => {
            window.location.href = "/helloworld";
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

from django.contrib import admin
from django.urls import path
from . import views

urlpatterns = [
    path('admin/', admin.site.urls),
    path('', views.index, name='index'),
    path('helloworld/', views.helloworld, name='helloworld'),
]

19.code:
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from datetime import datetime

def main():
    df = pd.read_csv('Deathlist.csv')
    df['Date of death'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Date of death'], format='%Y-%m-%d')
    df['Week number'] = df['Date of death'].dt.isocalendar().week
    weekly_deaths = df.groupby('Week number')['Date of death'].count()
    plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
    plt.bar(weekly_deaths.index, weekly_deaths.values)
    plt.xlabel('Week Number')
    plt.ylabel('Number of Deaths')
    plt.title('Weekly Deaths from Deathlist.csv')
    plt.grid(True)
    plt.show()

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
